parameters.jsCode:
// Format report for email const data = $input.first().json; const generateHTML = (data) => { return `

üìä Weekly AI Search Intelligence Report

${data.period}

üìà Performance Metrics

${data.total_citations}
Total Citations
${data.week_over_week_growth}
Week-over-Week
${data.key_metrics.citations_per_day}
Daily Average
${data.key_metrics.unique_domains_cited}
Unique Domains

üéØ High-Opportunity Content Gaps

${data.high_opportunity_gaps.slice(0, 10).map(gap => `
${gap.query_text} (Score: ${gap.opportunity_score.toFixed(2)})
Suggested: ${gap.suggested_content_type}
`).join('')}

üí° Key Recommendations

    ${data.recommendations.slice(0, 8).map(rec => `
  • ${rec.type}: ${rec.description} (${rec.priority} priority)
    • `).join('')}

üèÜ Top Performing Domains

    ${data.top_performing_domains.map((domain, index) => `
  • ${index + 1}. ${domain.name || domain} - ${domain.citations || 'N/A'} citations
    • `).join('')}

‚ö†Ô∏è Competitive Intelligence

Threats:

    ${data.competitor_analysis.threats.map(threat => `
  • ${threat.description || threat}
    • `).join('')}

Opportunities:

    ${data.competitor_analysis.opportunities.map(opp => `
  • ${opp.description || opp}
    • `).join('')}

Generated by AI Search Intelligence System on ${new Date().toLocaleString()}

`; }; const emailData = { subject: `üìä Weekly AI Search Intelligence Report - ${data.period}`, html: generateHTML(data), recipients: (process.env.REPORT_RECIPIENTS || 'team@company.com').split(','), summary: { total_citations: data.total_citations, growth: data.week_over_week_growth, top_opportunities: data.high_opportunity_gaps.slice(0, 3) } }; return { json: emailData };

parameters.jsonBody: ={"action_items": {{JSON.stringify($json.recommendations.map(rec => ({title: rec.description, action_type: rec.type, priority: rec.priority, expected_impact: rec.opportunity_score || 0.5, status: 'pending'})))}}}
